name: 黃昭勳
objective:
1. Tension, Compression, and Shear
2. Axially Loaded Members
3. Torsion
4. Shear Forces and Bending Moments
5. Stresses in Beams
6. Analysis of Stress and Strain
schedule:
1~2 Tension, Compression, and Shear
3~5 Axially Loaded Members
6~8 Torsion
9 Midterm Exam
10~11 Shear Forces and Bending Moments
12~14 Stresses in Beams
15~17 Analysis of Stress and Strain
18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quizzes 30%
Midterm Exam 30%
Final Exam 40%
materials: Mechanics of Materials, 9th Ed., James M. Gere

covid19.courseScoreMethod: 若無法小考,平時成績以作業計算.期中期末考以北科i學園進行線上測驗
covid19.courseInfo: 以北科i學園進行非同步遠距教學
